Verses: 1  Mersolliyavaigalin Mukkiyamaana Porulennavenil; Paralogaththilulla Magaththuva Aasanaththin Valadhu Paarisaththile Utkaarndhirukkiravarumaai,
2 parisuththa Sthalaththilum, Manusharaalalla, Karththaraal Sthaabikkappatta Meyyaana Koodaaraththilum Aasaariya Oozhiyanjseygiravarumaayirukkira Piradhaana Aasaariyar Namakku Undu.
3 ovvoru Piradhaana Aasaariyanum Kaanikkaigalaiyum Baligalaiyum Seluththumpadi Niyamikkappadugiraan; Aadhalaal Seluththumpadikku Edho Ondru Ivarukkum Avasiyam Vendiyadhaayirukkiradhu.
4 boomiyile Avar Iruppaaraanaal Aasaariyaraayirukkamaattaar; Enenil, Niyaayappiramaanaththinpadi Kaanikkaigalai Seluththugira Aasaariyargal Irukkiraargale;

5 ivargal Seyyum Aaraadhanai Paralogaththilullavaigailin Saayalukkum Nizhalukkum Oththirukkiradhu; Appadiye, Mose Koodaaraththai Undupannugaiyil Malaiyile Unakkuk Kaanpikkappatta Maadhiriyinpadiye Nee Ellaavatraiyum Seyya Echcharikkaiyaayiru Endru Dhevan Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
6 ivaro Viseshiththa Vaakkuththaththangalinperil Sthaabikkappatta Viseshiththa Udanpadikkaikku Eppadi Maththiyastharaayirukkiraaro, Appadiye Mukkiyamaana Aasaariya Oozhiyaththaiyum Petrirukkiraar.
7 andha Mudhalaam Udanpadikkai Pizhaiththirundhadhaanaal, Irandaam Udanpadikkaikku Idam Thedavenduvadhillaiye.
8 avargalaik Kutrappaduththi, Avargalai Nokki: Idho, Karththar Sollugiradhennavenil: Isravel Kudumbaththodum Yoodhaa Kudumpaththodum Naan Pudhu Udanpadikkaiyai Erpaduththunkaalam Varugiradhu.

9 avargaludaiya Pidhaakkalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Konduvarumpadikku Naan Avargaludaiya Kaiyaip Pidiththanaalile Avargalodu Pannina Udanpadikkaiyaippola Idhu Iruppadhillai; Andha Udanpadikkaiyile Avargal Nilainirkavillaiye, Naanum Avargalaip Purakkaniththen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 andha Naatkalukkuppinbu Naan Isravel Kudumpaththaarode Pannum Udanpadikkaiyaavadhu: Ennudaiya Piramaanangalai Avargaludaiya Manadhile Vaiththu, Avargaludaiya Irudhayangalil Avaigalai Ezhudhuven; Naan Avargal Dhevanaayiruppen, Avargal En Janamaayiruppaargal.
11 appozhudhu Siriyavan Mudharkondu Periyavanvaraikkum Ellaarum Ennai Arivaargal; Aagaiyaal, Karththarai Arindhukol Endru Oruvan Than Ayalaanukkum, Oruvan Than Sagodharanukkum Podhikkavenduvadhillai.
12 enenil Naan Avargal Aniyaayangalaik Kirubaiyaai Manniththu, Avargal Paavangalaiyum Akkiramangalaiyum Ini Ninaiyaamaliruppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
13 pudhu Udanpadikkai Endru Avar Sollugiradhinaale Mundhinadhai Pazhamaiyaakkinaar; Pazhamaiyaanadhum Naalpattadhumaayirukkiradhu Uruvazhindhupoga Kaalam Sameebiththirukkiradhu.
